public class GraphAdjacencyList extends AbstractGraph
Graph with adjacency list structure.

  • Method Details

    • getNodes

      public String[] getNodes()
      Returns an array of all nodes in the graph.
      Returns:
      array of node names, or empty array if graph has no nodes

    • addNode

      public void addNode(String name)
      Adds a new node to the graph.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the node to add

    • addEdge

      public void addEdge(String name1, String name2)
      Adds an edge between two existing nodes. For directed graphs, the edge goes from name1 to name2. For undirected graphs, creates a bidirectional connection.
      Parameters:
      name1 - the name of the first node
      name2 - the name of the second node

    • removeNode

      public void removeNode(String name)
      Removes a node and all edges connected to it from the graph.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the node to remove

    • removeEdge

      public void removeEdge(String name1, String name2)
      Removes an edge between two nodes.
      Parameters:
      name1 - the name of the first node
      name2 - the name of the second node

    • getNeighbours

      public NodeNeighbours getNeighbours(String name)
      Returns the neighbors of a specified node. For directed graphs, separates incoming and outgoing neighbors.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the node to get neighbors for
      Returns:
      NodeNeighbours object containing incoming and outgoing neighbors, or null if the node doesn't exist
